long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bubbles Cool is a bubble-shooter puzzle game available as a Chrome extension, where the objective is to pop all the bubbles on the screen. To do this, players must aim and group together at least three bubbles of the same color. The game encourages players to make large chains of popped bubbles to increase their score and maximize the fun. Bubbles Cool offers an addictive and challenging gameplay experience as players strive to achieve the highest possible score. The game can also be played for free on the Classroom 6x website.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee
